dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.
dependencies.name: libxml2

dependencies.description:
Libxslt is the XSLT C library developed for the GNOME project. XSLT
itself is a an XML language to define transformation for XML. Libxslt is
based on libxml2 the XML C library developed for the GNOME project. It
also implements most of the EXSLT set of processor-portable extensions
functions and some of Saxon's evaluate and expressions extensions.
dependencies.name: libxslt

dependencies.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.
dependencies.name: py-beautifulsoup4

dependencies.description:
Python-cssselect parses CSS3 Selectors and translate them to XPath 1.0
expressions. Such expressions can be used in lxml or another XPath
engine to find the matching elements in an XML or HTML document.
dependencies.name: py-cssselect

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: HTML parser based on the WHATWG HTML specification.
dependencies.name: py-html5lib

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
GtkDoc is a tool used to extract API documentation from C-code like
Doxygen, but handles documentation of GObject (including signals and
properties) that makes it very suitable for GTK+ apps and libraries. It
uses docbook for intermediate files and can produce html by default and
pdf/man-pages with some extra work.
dependent_to.name: gtk-doc

dependent_to.description:
A double-entry bookkeeping computer language that lets you define
financial transaction records in a text file, read them in memory,
generate a variety of reports from them, and provides a web interface..
dependent_to.name: py-beancount

dependent_to.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.
dependent_to.name: py-beautifulsoup4

dependent_to.description: Citations and bibliography formatter.
dependent_to.name: py-citeproc-py

dependent_to.description:
Python utilities to interact with Darshan log records of HPC
applications.
dependent_to.name: py-darshan

dependent_to.description: a lightweight Javascript-aware, headless web scraping library for Python
dependent_to.name: py-dryscrape

dependent_to.description:
The Environment for Tree Exploration (ETE) is a Python programming
toolkit that assists in the recontruction, manipulation, analysis and
visualization of phylogenetic trees (although clustering trees or any
other tree-like data structure are also supported).
dependent_to.name: py-ete3

dependent_to.description:
Automatic C++ library api documentation generation: breathe doxygen in
and exhale it out.
dependent_to.name: py-exhale

dependent_to.description: The Galaxy tool utilities.
dependent_to.name: py-galaxy-tool-util

dependent_to.description:
Gcovr provides a utility for managing the use of the GNU gcov utility
and generating summarized code coverage results. This command is
inspired by the Python coverage.py package, which provides a similar
utility for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-gcovr

dependent_to.description: Simple Client for Earth Engine Uploads with Selenium Support.
dependent_to.name: py-geeup

dependent_to.description: Generate Python data structures and XML parser from Xschema.
dependent_to.name: py-generateds

dependent_to.description:
glymur contains a Python interface to the OpenJPEG library which allows
one to read and write JPEG 2000 files. glymur works on Python 3.7, 3.8,
3.9, and 3.10.
dependent_to.name: py-glymur

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook Conversion
dependent_to.name: py-nbconvert

dependent_to.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.
dependent_to.name: py-networkx

dependent_to.description: Statistical learning for neuroimaging in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-nilearn

dependent_to.description:
ObsPy is an open-source project dedicated to provide a Python framework
for processing seismological data
dependent_to.name: py-obspy

dependent_to.description:
OpenMC is a community-developed Monte Carlo neutron and photon transport
simulation code. It is capable of performing fixed source, k-eigenvalue,
and subcritical multiplication calculations on models built using either
a constructive solid geometry or CAD representation. OpenMC supports
both continuous-energy and multigroup transport. The continuous-energy
particle interaction data is based on a native HDF5 format that can be
generated from ACE files produced by NJOY. Parallelism is enabled via a
hybrid MPI and OpenMP programming model.
dependent_to.name: py-openmc

dependent_to.description:
OWSLib is a Python package for client programming with Open Geospatial
Consortium (OGC) web service (hence OWS) interface standards, and their
related content models.
dependent_to.name: py-owslib

dependent_to.description:
Up-to-date remote data access for pandas. Works for multiple versions of
pandas
dependent_to.name: py-pandas-datareader

dependent_to.description: Documentation generator for C++
dependent_to.name: py-poxy

dependent_to.description:
A Python library for W3C Provenance Data Model (PROV). A library for W3C
Provenance Data Model supporting PROV-JSON, PROV-XML and PROV-O (RDF)
dependent_to.name: py-prov

dependent_to.description: Python Cortical mapping software for fMRI data.
dependent_to.name: py-pycortex

dependent_to.description: An implementation of the Data Access Protocol.
dependent_to.name: py-pydap

dependent_to.description:
pyKML is a Python package for parsing and authoring KML documents. It is
based on the lxml.objectify API which provides Pythonic access to XML
documents.
dependent_to.name: py-pykml

dependent_to.description:
This library is an implementation of the JSON-LD specification in
Python.
dependent_to.name: py-pyld

dependent_to.description: A PEG Parser-Interpreter in Python
dependent_to.name: py-pypeg2

dependent_to.description: Generate and manipulate Open XML PowerPoint (.pptx) files.
dependent_to.name: py-python-pptx

dependent_to.description: Python tools to create and manipulate SVG files.
dependent_to.name: py-svgutils

dependent_to.description: Import, export, process, analyze and view triangular meshes
dependent_to.name: py-trimesh

dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.
dependent_to.name: reframe

dependent_to.description: ROCPROFILER library for AMD HSA runtime API extension support
dependent_to.name: rocprofiler-dev

dependent_to.description:
VOTCA is a software package which focuses on the analysis of molecular
dynamics data, the development of systematic coarse-graining techniques
as well as methods used for simulating microscopic charge (and exciton)
transport in disordered semiconductors.
dependent_to.name: votca

description:
lxml is the most feature-rich and easy-to-use library for processing XML
and HTML in the Python language.
name: py-lxml

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
